Class OptionsDialogBuilder

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.fx.controls.abstract_builders.DialogPaneBuilder<OptionsDialog, OptionsDialogBuilder, Arguments>
com.dua3.utility.fx.controls.abstract_builders.DialogBuilder<OptionsDialog, OptionsDialogBuilder, Arguments>
com.dua3.utility.fx.controls.OptionsDialogBuilder
public class OptionsDialogBuilder extends DialogBuilder<OptionsDialog, OptionsDialogBuilder, Arguments>
Builder for OptionsDialog instances.

Provides a fluent API to configure an options dialog with a set of Options and current values.

    • getButtonDefs

      public final List<ButtonDef<Arguments>> getButtonDefs()
      Description copied from class: DialogPaneBuilder
      Retrieves the list of button definitions associated with this dialog pane builder. If no button definitions have been explicitly provided, a default list containing "OK" and "Cancel" buttons is returned. The buttons are defined with their respective actions, result handlers, and enablement state.
      Specified by:
      getButtonDefs in class DialogPaneBuilder<OptionsDialog, OptionsDialogBuilder, Arguments>
      Returns:
      a modifiable list of button definitions for this dialog pane builder
